packages.name: websubhub
packages.summary: This module contains an implementation of the W3C "WebSub" (https://www.w3.org/TR/websub/) recommendation, which facilitates a push-based content delivery/notification mechanism between publishers and subscribers.

modules.summary: This module contains an implementation of the W3C "WebSub" (https://www.w3.org/TR/websub/) recommendation, which facilitates a push-based content delivery/notification mechanism between publishers and subscribers.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic to register

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred registering the topic or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: registerTopic
remoteMethods.description:
Registers a topic in a Ballerina WebSub Hub against which subscribers can subscribe and the publisher will
publish updates.
```ballerina
    # error? registerTopic = websubHubClientEP->registerTopic("http://websubpubtopic.com");
    # ```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic to unregister

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred un registering the topic or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: unregisterTopic
remoteMethods.description:
Unregisters a topic in a Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
    # error? unregisterTopic = websubHubClientEP->unregisterTopic("http://websubpubtopic.com");
    #  ```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: The update payload

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The type of the update content to set as the `ContentType` header

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the update or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: publishUpdate
remoteMethods.description:
Publishes an update to a remote Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
    # error? publishUpdate = websubHubClientEP->publishUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com",{"action": "publish",
    # "mode": "remote-hub"});
    #  ```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the notification or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: notifyUpdate
remoteMethods.description:
Notifies a remote WebSub Hub from which an update is available to fetch for hubs that require publishing to
happen as such.
```ballerina
    #  error? notifyUpdate = websubHubClientEP->notifyUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com");
    #   ```

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to publish/notify updates

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The `http:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client or else `()`

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic to register

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred registering the topic or else `()`

clients.name: PublisherClient
clients.description: The HTTP based client for WebSub topic registration and unregistration, and notifying the hub of new updates.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The `websubhub:Service` object to attach

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description: Attaches the provided Service to the Listener.

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen for the service

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Invoked during the initialization of a `websubhub:Listener`. Either an `http:Listener` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The `websubhub:Service` object to attach

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process

methods.name: attach
methods.description: Attaches the provided Service to the Listener.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The service to be detached

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service detaching process

methods.name: detach
methods.description: Detaches the provided Service from the Listener.

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener starting process
An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description: Gracefully stops the hub listener. Already accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen for the service

Invoked during the initialization of a `websubhub:Listener`. Either an `http:Listener` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

parameters.description: The service to be detached

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service detaching process
